scripts.everything: npm run-script check && npm run-script build
scripts.check: npm run-script style && npm run-script test
scripts.style: npm run-script style-client && npm run-script style-server
scripts.style-client: ./node_modules/.bin/jshint --config=./dev/jshint-client.json notes/app/js/fixtures notes/test/js/spec notes/app/js/app notes-rest/test/js/spec-rest  notes-rest/app/js/app-rest chapters/*/test/js/spec doc
scripts.min-app: uglifyjs $(cat notes/app/index.html | egrep -o 'js/app/.*?\.js' | xargs -I {} echo 'notes-rest/app/{}') -m -c -o notes/app/js/app.min.js
scripts.min-rest: uglifyjs $(cat notes-rest/app/index.html | egrep -o '(js|js-rest)/app/.*?\.js' | xargs -I {} echo 'notes-rest/app/{}') -m -c -o notes-rest/app/js/app.min.js
scripts.build: npm run-script build-tmpl && npm run-script docs
